Title: Promised
Director: Nick Conidi, Tony Ferrieri(co-director), Nathan Primmer(co-director)
Actors: Paul Mercurio, Mirko Grillini, Tina Arena, Sunday Barca Irving
Plot: In 1953, two young Italian children are promised in marriage by their fathers. Twenty one years on - despite changing times, fading traditions and 70's liberation - the pair are expected to marry, or face the consequences.
